description: '''Sherelle Camille Thomas''' (born 3 September 1993), known [[mononym]]ously as '''Sherelle''' (stylized in [[all caps]]), is a British [[DJ]] and [[electronic music]]ian. With a background in [[dancehall]] and [[rave music]], Sherelle is best known for her [[DJ set]]s and mixes. Sherelle is also known for co-founding the [[Record label|label]] Hooversound with Naina and for founding Beautiful (stylized in all caps), a label and musical project for [[Black people|Black]] and [[LGBT]] musicians.
